sentences.sContent: So all of this is a legitimate source of concern.
sentences.sContent_eng: So all of this is a legitimate source of concern.
sentences.sCn: 因此，这些情况都是引发忧虑的合理根源。

sentences.sContent: Even though I had legitimate reasons ( bullshit ). You know I have to make them dividends ( bullshit ).
sentences.sContent_eng: Even though I had legitimate reasons ( bullshit ). You know I have to make them dividends ( bullshit ).
sentences.sCn: 即使我有合法的理由（胡说）。你知道我必须支付利息（胡说）。

sentences.sContent: Often, as in this case, there is no intentional hoaxing: It is a legitimate, straightforward photograph of something curious.
sentences.sContent_eng: Often, as in this case, there is no intentional hoaxing: It is a legitimate, straightforward photograph of something curious.
sentences.sCn: 就像此事一样，它们通常都是无意的闹剧：这是某些稀奇的东西合法的、易懂的照片。

synos.tran: 合法的；正当的；合理的；正统的

remMethod.val: legitim (合法) + ate (使) → 使合法

trans.tranCn: 正当的， 合理的； 合法的
